ygData.subject: Re: errors when maven dist
ygData.msgSnippet: I disabled the user/developer manual generation as you suggested, and I think the following attainGoal should also be erased.

I disabled the user/developer manual generation as you suggested, and
I think the following attainGoal should also be erased.

<postGoal name="dist:prepare-bin-filesystem">
...
    <attainGoal name="docbook"/>
...
</postGoal> 

after that, building processs did not output XSLT Error. but failed in
the following step.  This failure also occurs before the above updating.
I can find the mp3.mp3 file in that directory, why can't be copied?

---------------------------------------------------------

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, stack <stack@a...> wrote:
> To disable the user/developer manual generation, do the following:
> 
> 
> Index: maven.xml
> ===================================================================
> RCS file: /cvsroot/archive-crawler/ArchiveOpenCrawler/maven.xml,v
> retrieving revision 1.33
> diff -u -r1.33 maven.xml
> --- maven.xml   31 Aug 2004 23:47:59 -0000      1.33
> +++ maven.xml   6 Sep 2004 20:13:21 -0000
> @@ -12,7 +12,9 @@
>      <preGoal name="xdoc:jelly-transform">
>          <attainGoal name="faq"/>
>          <attainGoal name="heritrix-javadoc"/>
> +        <!--
>          <attainGoal name="docbook"/>
> +        -->
>      </preGoal>
> 
> 
> Yours,
> St.Ack
